name: Monty and the Temple of Lost Souls
name_original: Monty and the Temple of Lost Souls
description:
Guide Monty in his quest to plunder the treasure and escape from the Temple of Lost Souls.

Collect ancient artefacts and gemstones to open up hidden areas avoiding the traps and deadly inhabitants along the way.

Get rich and get out...or stay forever trapped as one of those poor lost souls.
